member.name: T:Windows.Win32.Foundation.HMODULE
member.summary: An HMODULE is a handle to an instance, or the base address of a loaded module (executable or DLL) in the calling process.
member.remarks:
HMODULE and are the same today, but represented different things in 16-bit Windows.
This type is declared in WinDef.h as follows: typedef HINSTANCE HMODULE;
